request.description:
Undocumented public apis require a **x-domo-authentication** header with the session token.  
Use Full Authentication request to get a session token.

Search Groups by Name

Returns a list of groups that meet search criteria

request.description:
Go to the dataset's data lineage page to monitor network traffic.

**traverseDown** \= false will retrieve the upstream or ancestor objects for the datasource.

*   Note lineage will also include the current object in the response
    

**traverseUp** \= false will retrieve the downstream

response.name: traverse down is False
traverse up is False

request.description: Monitor network traffic in the Data Center, https://{{domo_instance}}[.](https://domo-dojo.domo.com/datacenter/datasources)domo.com/datacenter/datasources, to see permutations of the filters you can apply to your dataset.

item.name: PDP

header.description: create by sending Full Authentication request

response.name: Alter Policy - Simple Filter

item.description:
PDP Policies can be set for multiple filter types (simple, calculated and trusted attributes), see the Alter Policy documentation for multiple examples

[Domo KB Article](https://domohelp.domo.com/hc/en-us/sections/360007334593-Personalized-Data-Permissions-PDP-)
